topic.title:
Do you find ZeroNet interface not very convenient?
Of course, it looks quite pretty but in some aspects it lacks flexibility. Let's
hope that developers will improve it in time.
Is it possible to use I2P  over ZeroNet?
Could ZeroNet be vulnerable to the Sybil attack?
topic.body: I've read recently about an exposure of p2p networks to this type of cyber-attack https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sybil_attack. Is ZeroNet well protected against forging identities?

topic.title: Will be there a revolution in China like in Soviet Union?
topic.body: Is it possible that China will be freed from dictatorship and censorship in next few decades?

topic.title: Is it too late to become a programmer in 25?
topic.body: Recently I've finished university but I don't know where to get well paid job. It's hard to get it with my specialty because it's too specific. I had my first experience with Basic being 11 year old, and started to learn C in 14. But I studied to program not regularly and often abandoned efforts. Last year obtained some XP with Python but not in the proficient level.

1519718894_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: It is unavoidable because of the greed for power lying in the foundation of human nature. Stronger human beings have been exploiting weaker persons since the beginning of history.

1519756518_1F1ucX4cPFMbafzcBipikdP6bWRFg.body: In my opinion, "interplanetary" is the metaphor which means that each computer participating in IPFS is quite autonomous like a planet.

1520480628_19k3r2zgWTUszFvHSBBrxDWzEt83V.body:
Nietzsche wrote about "will to power" which is inherent feature of every alive organism. Each biological specie fights for survival, for nutrients, space and reproduction. Tendency to expansion is a key property of biological life.
Small population of one specie would occupy the whole surface of this planet if there were not other competing biological species. As our human nature is being also animal and biological so we are driven the same desire of unlimited reproduction and expansion as wild animals. Biological meaning of life is about reproducing your genes and giving birth to healthy offsprings capable to continue your genetic line. We, humans, also tend to gain maxim amount of resources to secure our survival, reproduction and welfare of us and our progenies. 
So the following motto of our life may be declared: "Make as many children as you can and fight for resources and living space!"
War is a conflict between nation-states. What nation-state is? It is a political formation made up of millions of human organisms governed by some small group of people called political elite. In some aspects a state is similar to organism: it also tends to expand its influence on the environment and to drain maximal amount of resources from neighborhood. That shouldn't surprise us as a state is built by living organisms so there is a similarity between them.
And like living organisms states often fight for resources and reproduction. 
I may conclude that "the will to power" is the answer to your question.

1522586677_1CuFXko1Q3MMRkboFygeu9DxNVAFG.body: It is not easy though it's quite possible to attack ZeroNet using social attacks or Sybil attacks. Authorities can block zeronet.io, github but source code of the project will be hosted in other internet resources in such case.

1526350593_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: But there is a lot of other interesting things in the world besides drugs and alcohol. You can rush into creative activities, research new technologies, science and universe.

1526387869_12HSLurcaibJh4A44LGHoXm6cv6jA.body:
> [eibriel](#comment_53_1BYU9zV786auJ29dF3HMAQYhxA2WgN4ofi): No! Why are you even asking that!?

I feel uncertainty about my ability to compete with younger coders possessing even greater experience 
than I have

1526546167_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: But what about prospects? Without them I would consider my life quite pointless.

1527229050_1Kma1Pz9kBSHmDtK1iYtHTox14Edm.body: Why are you so sure about this scenario? At modern rate of technological development we can't be sure even about events in several months.
